channel.title: Posts on AML-CS | Uninorte
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on AML-CS | Uninorte

item.title: WRF + WRFDA Uninorte HPC
item.description: The following guide show how to install, configure and run the Weather Research and Forecasting Model (WRF) and it’s most popular module WRFDA in CentOS 8.2 - OpenHPC.

item.title: Setup mpi4py in OpenHPC
item.description: How to setup mpi4py using miniconda in Centos 7 - OpenHPC. Including examples for run an Interactive session and SBATCH.

item.title: How to install C and FORTRAN versions of NetCDF in Ubuntu 10.15
